creator: Buzzer Pty Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Buzzer is reshaping community safety!

Designed to be the fastest method of providing you a swift response in case of emergencies, Buzzer is the future of personal and community safety.

We have all witnessed safety in numbers and this way you can ask for help from the people closest to you, within your community. It also allows you to help when and if you can.

Buzzer links in with Security Companies, Neighbourhood Watches and all other responders, allowing responders to:

* Receive alerts for nearby incidents

* See where other responders are.

* See who is responding to an incident and coordinate your team


With Buzzer you are able to pay less attention to your often-spammy community WhatsApp groups, and only be notified when there is an actual problem in your area.

After reporting an incident, Buzzer will send a distress signal to a private monitoring center with live agents, which will then call the police, fire, or other emergency department, as well as report to the relevant security companies in your neighborhood.

Buzzer community safety is all about simplicity and effectiveness, because when it comes to safety - every second counts.

We are constantly looking to improve Buzzer, so if you have any feedback, comments, concerns, please reach out to us info@buzzer.co.za
descriptionShort: Revolutionising emergency response and team collaboration.

After reporting an incident, Buzzer will send a distress signal to a private monitoring center with live agents, which will then call the police, fire, or other emergency department, as well as report to the relevant security companies in your neighborhood.

Buzzer community safety is all about simplicity and effectiveness, because when it comes to safety - every second counts.

We are constantly looking to improve Buzzer, so if you have any feedback, comments, concerns, please reach out to us info@buzzer.co.za

Designed to be the fastest method of providing you a swift response in case of emergencies, Buzzer is the future of personal and community safety.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: * General speed and reliability improvements

title:
Buzzer Community
2.0.44

creator: BUZZER SAFETY APP (PTY) LTD
descriptionHtml:
Experience the future of personal and community safety with Buzzer!

Empower yourself with the fastest emergency response system at your fingertips. Buzzer is your lifeline in critical situations, connecting you with the closest members of your community for immediate assistance.

By leveraging the power of collective safety, Buzzer ensures that help is always close. Whether you need aid or can offer assistance, Buzzer facilitates seamless communication within your neighbourhood, linking with neighbours and community members, security companies, neighbourhood watches, and other responders.

Key features include:
* SOS Panic Button: Get help in seconds by tapping the SOS button.
* Instant Location Sharing: Share your real-time location for quick assistance.
* Safety And Incident Reporting: Report concerns, including municipal, crime, fire, medical, wildlife and more.
* Stay Connected: Add loved ones for peace of mind.
* Custom Alerts: Receive relevant safety alerts and broadcast notifications by adding familiar places.

Say goodbye to endless community WhatsApp notifications. With Buzzer, you'll only be alerted when there's a genuine concern in your area.

In an emergency, Buzzer automatically sends a distress signal to a private monitoring centre staffed by live agents. These agents swiftly dispatch the appropriate emergency services and notify relevant security companies in your vicinity.

We're committed to enhancing your safety experience with Buzzer. Your feedback, comments, and concerns are invaluable to us.

Contact us at info@buzzer.co.za, and let's make our communities safer together.
descriptionShort: Revolutionising emergency response and team collaboration.
